Question: Rise Gardens Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Rise Gardens Inc.

Product: Rise Garden Charcoal Collection

- Modular hydroponic smart garden for indoor vegetable cultivation
- Upgraded with more durable electronics and larger water reservoir
- Easier to assemble and clean
- Can grow up to 108 edible plants indoors
- Wi-Fi enabled and app-controlled for easy management
- Features self-watering and self-fertilizing technology
- Available in Cloud (white) or Charcoal (black) finish
- App provides notifications for watering, nutrient addition, pruning, pollination, and harvest
- Offers a variety of seed pods for growing different plants
- Uses powder-coated metal and real wood structure for an upscale, minimalist aesthetic
Summary_cn:
Rise Gardens公司。

产品：Rise Garden Charcoal Collection

- 室内蔬菜种植的模块化水培智能花园
- 升级版电子设备更耐用，水箱更大
- 容易组装和清洁
- 可在室内种植多达108种可食用植物
- 支持Wi-Fi和应用控制，管理便捷
- 自动浇水和自动施肥技术
- 有云（白色）或炭黑（黑色）两种颜色可选
- 应用提供浇水、添加养分、修剪、授粉和收获的通知
- 提供各种种子荚，适用于种植不同植物
- 使用粉末涂层金属和真木结构，时尚简约风格
